channel.title: Globaldrops.cfg Doesn't Load - Please please help!
channel.description: I've tried adding some things in it and they don't spawn in the coords I put. Even the ones that were there before like the mind rune that spawns in lumby doesn't load. Please help.

item.title: Globaldrops.cfg Doesn't Load - Please please help!
item.dc:creator: @SecondHeat SecondHeat
item.description:
@SecondHeat wrote:

Nope. I’ve searched and saw that some people got an error that said they couldn’t find all the .cfg files but this is not the case.

Read full topic

item.title: Globaldrops.cfg Doesn't Load - Please please help!
item.dc:creator: @SecondHeat SecondHeat
item.description:
@SecondHeat wrote:

Alright so I made this in globaldrops.cfg

drop = 554 3087 3102 500 1 0 Tut Drop 1
drop = 556 3088 3102 500 1 0 Tut Drop 2
drop = 556 3089 3102 500 1 0 Tut Drop 3
drop = 555 3090 3102 500 1 0 Tut Drop 4
drop = 558 3090 3103 500 1 0 Tut Drop 5
drop = 562 3090 3104 500 1 0 Tut Drop 6
drop = 561 3090 3105 500 1 0 Tut Drop 7
drop = 841 3090 3106 500 1 0 Tut Drop 8
drop = 884 3090 3107 1 1 0 Tut Drop 9
drop = 3015 3089 3107 500 1 0 Tut Drop 10
drop = 1153 3088 3107 1 1 0 Tut Drop 11
drop = 1115 3091 3106 1 1 0 Tut Drop 12
drop = 1067 3091 3107 1 1 0 Tut Drop 13
drop = 1191 3091 3102 1 1 0 Tut Drop 14
drop = 1323 3091 3103 1 1 0 Tut Drop 15
drop = 1333 3093 3101 1 1 0 Tut Drop 16
drop = 4587 3095 3103 1 1 0 Tut Drop 17
drop = 1725 3096 3110 1 1 0 Tut Drop 18
drop = 995 3094 3111 1000000 1 0 Tut Drop 19
drop = 386 3091 3110 500 1 0 Tut Drop 20

I wanted to make an area at tutorial island where you can pick up your starter items (I thought it would be cool). Anyways, so I teleport to the cords there and none of them are there (Yes I restarted, compiled, etc.) Its the same problem for dds-specz and this other one I am using right now. If there isn’t a way to make items on the ground spawn with globaldrops, is there a way I can do it in Client.java?

Read full topic
item.source: Globaldrops.cfg Doesn't Load - Please please help!
